documentation.text: @notice member airlines can self-register using this function

@notice remove airline from consortium
 @param _memberAirline address of the airline to remove
@notice add escrow to be able to transact with other member airlines

NotAMember().details: throws when provided address isn't a member airline

Unauthorized(string).details: throws when an unauthorized actor is trying to call a function

EscrowReplenished(address,uint256).details: emit when member airline replenishes escrow

NewASKRequest(uint256,uint256,uint256,ui.details: emit when a request is sent `_fromAirline` to `_toAirline`

params._toAirline: address of airline receiving the request

NewASKResponse(uint256,bool,address).details: emit when a request is responded to

params._fromAirline: the address of the airline that initially sent the request
params._success: status of the response. `true` if the request was attended to otherwise `false`

PaymentSettled(address,address,uint256).details: emit when payment settlement occurs for customer exchange between airlines

params._reqID: ID of the request whose payment is settled

params._toAirline: address of airline `msg.sender` is sending request to

params._fromAirline: the address of the airline that initially sent the request

params._reqID: ID of the passenger exchange request
params._toAirline: address of the airline who responded to the request and accepted passenger

params._memberAirline: address of the airline to remove

ASKRequest(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: register a request for transfer of customer

register().notice: member airlines can self-register using this function

replenishEscrow().notice: add escrow to be able to transact with other member airlines

settlePayment(uint256,address,uint256).notice: settle payment for a passenger exchange
